segments.text: Observing this kitchen drawing, it's a typical domestic setup.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman stands by the sink, carefully drying a plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Faucet on, water filling up and starting to overflow.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Puddle forming under her, but she remains focused.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: To the side, open cabinet with the cookie jar inside.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Boy on a step stool, one hand in the jar, the other holding a plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool's legs are spread unevenly, almost tipping.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Girl nearby, arm raised toward him expectantly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Window above the sink shows a neat garden path.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Curtains pulled back, letting in daylight.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Dishes piled on the counter, waiting their turn.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's odd how none of them notice the water issue.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The contrast between inside and outside is striking.
segments.speaker: PAR
